mapper.select: /* getQuizTotalCount - 퀴즈 전체 갯수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT QUIZ_NO) FROM QUIZ

/* getQuizList - 퀴즈 전체 조회 */ SELECT QUIZ_NO , QUIZ_TITLE , QUIZ_LEVEL , TOTAL_COUNT , CORRECT_COUNT , CORRECT_RATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R , QUIZ_NO , QUIZ_TITLE , QUIZ_LEVEL , TOTAL_COUNT , CORRECT_COUNT , CORRECT_RATE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT QUIZ_NO , QUIZ_TITLE , QUIZ_LEVEL , NVL(c.TOTAL_COUNT, 0) AS TOTAL_COUNT , NVL(c.CORRECT_COUNT, 0) AS CORRECT_COUNT , CASE WHEN TOTAL_COUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 100*CORRECT_COUNT/TOTAL_COUNT END AS CORRECT_RATE FROM QUIZ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT QUIZ_NO , COUNT(QUIZ_NO) AS TOTAL_COUNT , SUM(ANSWER_CHECK) AS CORRECT_COUNT FROM MEMBER_QUIZ_ANSWER GROUP BY QUIZ_NO ) c USING(QUIZ_NO)
) q ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}

sql.if:
LEFT JOIN MEMBER_QUIZ_ANSWER mqa USING(QUIZ_NO)
AND QUIZ_LEVEL = #{searchItem}
AND (mqa.MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id} AND ANSWER_CHECK = 1)
AND ((mqa.MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id} AND ANSWER_CHECK = 0)
OR mqa.MEMBER_ID IS NULL
)
AND QUIZ_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

mapper.sql:
ORDER BY
CORRECT_RATE DESC,
CORRECT_RATE ASC,
TOTAL_COUNT DESC,
TOTAL_COUNT ASC,
QUIZ_NO DESC
mapper.select: /* getQuizLevel - 퀴즈 난이도 조회 */ SELECT QUIZ_LEVEL FROM QUIZ WHERE QUIZ_NO = #{quiz_No}
